6490/A0/04/004/004.status_value: Birth registration system in PNG is free. However  the system remains largely centralized beyond the reach most of PNG children. Government has started the process of decentralization of civil registration system  but the process is stalled due to shortage of funding. UNICEF is supporting decentralised birth registration system in Kairuku District and will aims to issue birth certificates to 30 000 children in 2017.
